price: Ni jette: “Ani sirraa Rahmaanitti maganfadha. Yoo kan (Rabbiin) sodaattu taateef (naa tuqin)”
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
